title: Standardizing Cannabis Operating Procedure
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Green Flower, founded by CEO Max Simon in 2014, is a training platform built for cannabis professionals. Ganjier is its cannabis sommelier certification program. The GF Institute is its newest effort, focused on cannabis workforce development - 30 leading companies including AYR Wellness and Cresco, are founding member brands. Developing standardized process to asses cannabis quality. The people problem in the industry. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
